headline: The entity BlackGospel is an full-stack web developer offering web-design, web-applications, creative development services in ReactJS.
content: Experienced JavaScript Developer with 5+ years in the industry. Proficient with React. Used problem-solving aptitude to create web applications and enhance application performance by 14%. Created data visualization tools and pixel-perfect designs. Increased speed of product lifecycle and 100% of the time delivered projects within deadline. Seeking opportunties to leverage experience with JavaScript to impress existing clients and obtain new ones.
